meanings.definition: The quality of being playful or full of fun and humor.
meanings.sent1: Children's playfulnesses can brighten up any room.
meanings.sent2: Her playfulnesses always bring a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's playfulnesses with a ball of yarn entertained us all.
meanings.sent4: The playfulnesses of the wind made the leaves dance in the air.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's playfulnesses were contagious, spreading joy to all who watched.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that are lighthearted and amusing.
meanings.sent1: The group of friends enjoyed the playfulnesses of their inside jokes.
meanings.sent2: During the party, there was an abundance of playfulnesses and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's playfulnesses on stage had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The playfulnesses of the squirrel as it chased its tail were a delight to watch.
meanings.sent5: In the park, the children's playfulnesses filled the air with joy and happiness.
